## Implementation Notes

### API Design
- Admin-only access enforcement on all endpoints
- Company scoping via `session.user.selectedCompanyId`
- Soft delete pattern (sets `isActive: false`)
- Association protection prevents deletion of brands with components/SKUs
- Name uniqueness enforced per company

### UI Patterns
- Followed LocationTable pattern for BrandTable
- Followed LocationForm pattern for BrandForm
- Tag icon from lucide-react (consistent with BrandSelector)
- Badge variants: "success" for Active, "secondary" for Inactive
